Body:
indir = Path(tempfile.mkdtemp())
blastn_file = tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w+', dir=indir, encoding=
    'utf-8', suffix='.BLASTn')
blastn_file.write('tmp')
blastn_file.flush()
assert len(list(indir.glob('*.BLASTn'))) != 0
delete_blastn_files(indir=indir)
assert len(list(indir.glob('*.BLASTn'))) == 0
